attributes.action: Help the Naomi House Hospice by guaranting the savings tied up in the Icelandic Bank and all charities involved.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Naomi House has £5.7m of its reserves tied up in Icelandic bank Kaupthing Singer and Friedlander, which failed in early October. Whitehall has already guaranteed the savings of individual investors caught up in Iceland’s banking crisis, but not charities

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
